website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and extremely portable, these goals are great for pre-teens.
pros: Choice of 2.5-foot, 4-foot, or 6-foot goals and carry bag
Twist flat for storage and transportation
Includes plastic spikes to secure to ground
Great for backyard play and practice for pre-teen players
cons: 6-foot goals are a little large to fit in smaller vehicles even when collapsed
Since they are intended to be light and portable, the fabric and poles can fail

customer_reviews.title: 6 foot too large for easy transport, 4 foot just right
customer_reviews.text: We originally went with the 6 foot size because my daughter is a tall 8, and I wanted to be able to use this for a long time. However, when the giant box arrived, I realized this size wasn't going to work for our small city sized lot or our small SUV. The nets fold down, but the 6 foot one folds to 4 foot at the widest point. I returned the large one for the 4 foot one and am much happier. The kids are outside playing soccer now!
customer_reviews.author: Tesha Christensen

customer_reviews.title: The goals have withstood the onslaught and have been excellent! The customer service is absolutely sensational
customer_reviews.text: I am a club soccer coach and a rec league soccer coach. I have been using these goals now for a few months with my teams. My older kids slam the ball into these goals, and sometime run right through them. The goals have withstood the onslaught and have been excellent! The customer service is absolutely sensational. If there are any issues, the company takes care of you and wants to make you happy. For me, having the Velcro straps to keep the goals folded while putting them into the carrying bag is an great feature. Thanks for making a wonderful product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Nets seem of good quality but the ground anchors break easy
customer_reviews.text: I would have given the item a four but then bought the plastic pegs that hold the nets down are very thin and break easy when getting in and out of the ground. I bought the Forza nets of similar style and they have a much more rugged set of hold down spikes that you can hit with a hammer and pull up with a hammer very easily. I'm stuck with these goals now and will have to make up my own anchors from items at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the durability
customer_reviews.text: I play soccer at the collegiate level and use this goals to train at various places during the off season. These are great goals for setting up and playing anywhere. Very easy to set up and put away. Though these goals have many positives they are not very durable. I've used this goals only 12 times in less than a month and one of the poles has already snapped during use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, colorful and transportable.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves these, they haven't been put away since I bought them for him, he has been taking them to his buddies' houses for pick up games and also to the soccer field when they practice. They are a nice bold color and the pins hold them in place well. I bought the 4 feet wide ones but can see buying the bigger ones in the future as he is now 9 years old. I hope the plastic stakes hold up, so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: A. Darling

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: My boys are 8 & 10 years old they play soccer everyday after school. Within two weeks both goals had totally ripped and I had to order new goals. I went with a different brand because these were so dissapointng.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Christian

customer_reviews.title: These are BIG, convenient and good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality portable goals. The attached anchor spikescome in handy when playing in grass but do not get in the way when playing on turf. I purchased the largest size; I'm 6'2" and they can be unwieldy when trying to fold. My vertically challenged assistant coach struggles a bit. One cool feature I noticed the other night is a reflective strip around the edge of the goal mouth. The included case allows the folded goals to sit on the bottom of my truck without worrying that the netting will get tangled with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian88

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable soccer goals backed by exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 6' set for our 10 year old daughter and they're exceptional for training. The set is built to high quality standards and is very simple to expand and collapse. The set is also fairly lightweight yet durable for heavy use. Our daughter's team has also used the goals in windy conditions and didn't experience any problems. We damaged the included case and GOLME sent us a free replacement. Customer service was exceptional and very responsive. This set is highly recommended for ease of use, durability, and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Good Quality, Happy Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the price paid. The stakes used to secure the goals in place are significant enough to hold the nets while in use and do not bend or break from the usage I put the goals through. This was purchased for 1st graders. I went with the smaller size to hone shooting skill, and was very pleased with the value these GOLME items provided. I would recommend them to anyone looking for good quality practice items for younger youth.
customer_reviews.author: Burton Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service - Fixed original issue
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the second time my two girls played with these they broke. The pole that goes across the top broke/creased in the center. I can't imagine if these were used regularly these would hold up. Disappointed in the quality as now one of the goals will not longer stay up. Will contact Amazon and the manufacturer to see about a replacement and report back. Updated: After contacting Goalme they asked for a picture and quickly fixed the situation by sending a brand new goal as part of there 1 year warranty program. The new product has performed without issues. I would recommend this company, they will stand behind there product and responded to my issue very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: kindle23

customer_reviews.title: These things are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was about to buy a similar product at Dicks for $30 each. These are WAY better than anything Dicks has for a fraction of the price. They come in a nice case that fits both goals. They have very durable plastic stakes attached so you can make sure they stay in place on the grass. They fold easily and have little velcro straps that keep them folded. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in SD

customer_reviews.title: Great for an active toddler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my cousin's kid who is a very active four year old. They signed him up on a soccer team and this was used at home to get him more comfortable playing. He is really good and actually hits the ball on the field and doesn't run from it. This is also great for older kids, since his bigger cousins and adults use it when they play soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Amra

customer_reviews.title: looks nice but ...
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, but around a bunch of 7 year old's, they don't stand a chance. You really have to take care of them. I bought them for my team to practice. They are still ok, but they are showing signs of fatigue already. One ripped from one of the three plastic holding pins. If you want it for the backyard, these are great. But for team playing I would look for something more durable. The color is nice, and they come in a big bag with a zipper, fair price.
customer_reviews.author: David Soto

customer_reviews.title: Quality goals
customer_reviews.text: Have owned and used for about a month now. Was hesitant because I have used Pugg goals for many years now. However, after about a month and about 15 uses, I'm very impressed with the durability and quality. I read many reviews before buying these and was impressed with the comments about quality and customer service. I'm glad I got these goals.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These goals were so easy to set up and then twist to put back in the very nice carrying case which stores compactly. The plastic stakes worried me when I began to place them in the grass but as we have had rain recently they went in easily and held the goals in place even on a highly windy day. My 5, 3 and 2 1/2 year old grandsons loved them and in a year I will purchase the larger goals.
customer_reviews.author: P. Burton

customer_reviews.title: LIght, portable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to practice her accuracy and passing drills. Both nets with the included case are very light and portable. Opening and anchoring to the field is simple and fast. Pretty easy to fold after you are done. The plastic anchors are attached to the nets so you don't lose them. When the anchors are in, the nets are pretty strong and stay on the ground pretty well. I am very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bull Trader

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, our 3yr old is starting soccer this fall and I wanted something quick and easy to setup in the yard to have fun learning how to play. She loves when we head out and I can pop them open and stake the down them in and be playing and running around. After we are done they break down fast and get stored in the carrying bag that was included to hang up in the garage. The quality seems really good for the price, I wish they had these popup goals when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.author: Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little shocked at the quality and durability. We have used this on several camping trips and family outings. Kids love them both day and night. Outer frame is light reflective and makes these perfect for dusk and night play. We also purchased a light up soccer ball to round out the purchase. Kids love them both. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had about 10 practices with my U12 boys team and they have been taking a beating and work great. No problems with the stakes or with them breaking - not sure how that happens unless you twist them wrong when trying to fold up. My boys have been hitting them pretty hard and they are holding up, but still early. I even like the Velcro that allows you to tie them up after collapsing so they stay together. Nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Tippitt

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, durable construction
customer_reviews.text: So much easier and faster than the square goals to set up. Literally 30 seconds to set up and take down. Kids have run over it and stepped on it, no damage. Downsides are that it isn't a standard shape for a goal when set up, and the bag is rather large when it is put away. I wouldn't go back, though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Durable, and Portable!
customer_reviews.text: these nets are one simple fold and it already has the stakes tied to the goals themselves! We got the 2.5 to make it more fun and play soccer games without a goalie. I have kids 2-6 which love running back and forth playing soccer. Recommend to anyone who needs a quick pop up goal to take with you.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking about getting the 6' goals at first, but after reading reviews opted for the 4' ones because I wanted to be able to transport them easier - I"m so glad I did! These are the perfect size, great for transporting, and easy to set up. It took a bit for me to figure out how to fold them back up, but once I did it was a piece of cake (see illustration they print on the inside of the travel bag). I"m so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shann

customer_reviews.title: So easy to fold!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been through a few different iterations of soccer goals. These are the absolute best and easiest to deal with. They fold super easy they are a decent size and they have stakes connected to them that just go right into the ground. Highly recommend. Comes with two goals.
customer_reviews.author: Jboshea

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: These are the ones to buy. I don't recall reading about the integrated stakes but that is an AWESOME feature. I hate not being able to find the little metal stakes that come with the others. The reflective stripe is great to for continuing practice as the sun fades.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Great practice goals!
customer_reviews.text: Yes these are awesome. We normally buy Pugg goals for our club but recently have had issues folding them. These go back right away and seem to be stronger too. One thing is they came in a huge box with lots of unnecessary packaging. At first I thought I ordered the wrong goals. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: HiloStyle

customer_reviews.title: I borrowed a pair of Golme nets last season from another coach and was so happy with them I went out and bought my own ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been involved in soccer in one way or another for over 40 years and have been coaching for the last 10 years. I borrowed a pair of Golme nets last season from another coach and was so happy with them I went out and bought my own for the upcoming season. Durable and held up well to all the abuse that six-year-old boys can deal out. Easy to fold. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: A Guy in Denver

customer_reviews.title: FPV Gates
customer_reviews.text: In that these would make great soccer goals I ended up using them as FPV Racing gates. I simply cut away most of the netting and now they are the most handy little pop up gate on the market. For the price in light of my usage they are better than the competition. If you fly FPV...buy a set...or two
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I coached soccer last year for 5-6 year olds and was lended goals like these to use throughout the season. The goals I was lended were impossible to fold and put back in the bag, so needless to say, I was skeptical about buying these. My kids have used them twice now, and they're extremely easy to put on the field and to put in the bag. I would recommend these to anyone coaching little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great goals for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to fold (iif you need to store them) and create a great backyard soccer field. My 8 year old is out there with me or kids on the street for hours on the weekends and after school. The small bungie cords connected to the plastic stakes on the sides and back keep the nets tight. They can take a good beating from line drive shots etc. Believe me we've already put them to the test. Kids even fall into them and they just bend and pop right back up. Definitely would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: G.Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excited to play some football!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size, very light and easy to carry, and will fit anywhere to store or move. It took me a few tries to fold them back up- they twist similarly to folding car sunshades, so it would take an adult or teen to get them folded again. They have a built in stake so they don’t blow away.
customer_reviews.author: vmumm4409

customer_reviews.title: The kids (ages 4 & 6) love these! They're perfect for an impromptu game in ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids (ages 4 & 6) love these! They're perfect for an impromptu game in the yard but they can also handle a much bigger game at the park with the older kids and parents. Sure, the twisting/repacking of the goals can be confusing at first but once you figure it out, it's easy every time after. Also, the goals come with s great storage case design. The whole product is well-made and the service was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: The Specht's

customer_reviews.title: Company stands behind their products
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Original rating changed because the defective carrying cases were replaced by customer service within hours of emailing. Excellent service to stand behind the product and offer a one year warranty on their products. Couldn't get anyone on the phone, but once I emailed received a response quickly. I would rate these 5 stars - highly visible, orange color, reflective, sturdy nets for practices. Carrying case zipper was defective and wouldn't zipper properly. Unfortunately it finally came apart, and just outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but plastic rod snaps easily. Golme sent replacement but only lasted a season.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 1 use. Then plastic rod snapped even though I followed instructions on how to fold. The overall quality actually seemed very good but rod seems to be weak point. UPDATE: I contacted Golme instead of returning to Amazon. I got an immediate response and instead of sending a replacement rod they sent a new one Update 2: replacement only lasted 1 season. Now rods on both goals snapped even though I was careful to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Lomat

customer_reviews.title: Has held up great
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the more expensive brands and they break after a few solid uses. These ones have held up for three seasons being used by two different teams. I have both the 2' and 4' with few issue. Only thing to be aware of is one of the rear steaks popped off and would have to be sewed back on.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Burley

customer_reviews.title: scrimmages just got better
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of my friends and I using our bags/cones as goals and then arguing if the ball was too high or if it actually went in between the objects. These goals eliminated all our problems. We actually know when a goal is a goal and can actually shoot with power if you have the spikes from the net locked down firmly. The net won't go flying off and the sound it makes is very satisfying. The 4was a perfect size being not too big , not too small. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Buddha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for practices for kids 4-10
customer_reviews.text: Second set of goals we have purchased from GOLME. others wore out because we used them so much! The first set lasted us well over 2 years with 3 different teams using them in a season. I highly recommend these goals for training sessions, cheaper than other competitors, but work as good or better.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable goals, fits into my Civic's trunk!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for what I needed/wanted. I especially like how they twist, fold up and pack away into the included sleeve/bag. One reviewer mentioned that you shouldn't try to "stomp" the plastic stakes into the ground so I carry a rubber mallet and that does the trick. Once secured into the ground, the goals basically won't budge unless you are rocketing shots in from point blank, which shouldn't be the case ordinarily, unless you have a team of BU08, which I do. But even then, nothing gets damaged and I just pound the stakes in again. They've held up over the spring season and I can't see any wear or tear except for the mud stains. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: esl537

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product that works as one would expect and desire. It’s easy to unfold and it’s sturdy. We’re happy with it. After about 5 years of abuse it started to rip but we came back and bought the same set again instead of looking for something else. We’re a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Yours Truly

customer_reviews.title: bad choice
customer_reviews.text: They are not durable. Have been playing with my kids (9 and 6 yr, no hard kicks) just for a few weeks (most of the days) and the goals already started to fell apart. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mykola Pavliuchenkov

customer_reviews.title: Durable & easy to storage
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. The stakes help them stay up in the ground - they even withstood a 20mph windy day when we didn't get home to bring them inside. They are the right size for my 6 and 4 yr old to play with. They fold up easily back into the storage case when not in use. They've been handy to bring to a park also.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hope to be today
customer_reviews.text: This is bought as a Christmas gift. Everybody's eyes lit up when I saw it. It was exactly what they wanted and the kids immediately start putting it upon use even before we start picking up the papers that he was wrapped in
customer_reviews.author: Richard Liebespach

customer_reviews.title: Great practice goals
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased from this company and it definitely a well made product. The first time I purchase from this company it was just one soccer goal and smaller, which was perfect for my grandchildren when they were in their first year playing soccer. Having the two goals and bigger ones are even better. I have only one warning and that is to be very careful when opening and closing the goals because of the spikes. It's great they are attached but be very careful no keep them away from the face.
customer_reviews.author: PatinSC

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT to practice footwork and accuracy. Super easy to fold and store when not in use. My 12 yo can do it himself which is nice to be able to send him out to set up and clean up without me. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HV

customer_reviews.title: Love these goals!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially concerned about the ease of being able to fold these babies into their original folded after popping them out. It was unwarranted worry because these goals fold up fabulously which really does make them perfect for taking with you for a pick up game anywhere. They are very sturdy and even have stakes to hold the front down so the goals stay in place. They are a nice size. Larger than I anticipated which is a good thing. I'm glad I purchased these for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Deeof3

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was pink (and that was why I ordered it - for a pink loving little girl) - however, it is actually orange. It does not change the item itself, however, and we found it to be exactly what I was anticipating and perfect for our needs! Folds up easy (once you figure out which way to do it!) and stores super easily..great purchase and would highly recommend. Oh, and we did anchor it in the sand at the beach one day and the wind *did* catch it, but we've only done that once, it was SUPER windy, and we haphazardly pushed the anchors into the sand with the pressure of our feet..so, I still feel it's fine!
customer_reviews.author: Carre Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soccer goal!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great alternative to a full sized soccer goal. I didn't want a permanent goal set up in the yard but my daughter is a competitive soccer player so she really needed to be able to practice at home. These are great because she can easily take them with her to the park or wherever she's going for training. Best part, they just slide behind her stuff in the closet against the wall so they don't take up any additional space.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: No compliants
customer_reviews.text: Goals work fine. They are anchored by 3 stakes that have met our needs so far. Folding them is a bit tricky, but that's the case with anything that relies on these wires and a figure 8 folding design to lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: I run about 36 girls a day through practice and they've been great. The threading came undone on one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Golme Pro Pop Up 2.5 I bought these for my girls high school program, I run about 36 girls a day through practice and they've been great. The threading came undone on one of the goals and when I contacted Golme they were awesome, asked me to send them a photo of the damage and no questions asked are sending me another goal right away. Thanks You Golme, I will being buying more sets Coach G
customer_reviews.author: Len Gosselin

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year only.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these 3 years ago. They were great for the first year when we only used them a handful of times. Then the strap on one broke, then the strap on the other and today a net tore. My kids are not aggressive and we have kept these mostly in the bags until the past year since my 4 year old is finally more interested in soccer. Overall they are good for about a year but not a long term investment!!! Quite a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KVD

customer_reviews.title: I liked the quality of the goal net
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the goal net. Is very easy to fold them again. The price is very good, I would say that for the quality, they are cheap. For me is fine both goals are in the same bagaje, but might be good to have separate bags. At the begining I complain because Amazon did not fulfill the delivery date, even when I paid for express shipping, but I understand that it was Amazon problema, not the company that sells the goals.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lightweight, kids love them
customer_reviews.text: We actually have goals by this brand in two sizes. My kids use a smaller size goal to play knee hockey in the basement when they are cooped up inside in the winter, and they are perfect size, but easy to move around. We ordered this size (larger size) for them to practice soccer in the backyard. There is a little bit of a learning curve to folding these up (especially the bigger ones, as they are a little awkward), but these are great, high-quality practice goals.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goals
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using these for a few weeks now for his U7 soccer team, perfect size and easy to set up and put away. The quality is great and I can tell these will last.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Molina

customer_reviews.title: Great goals, until they broke
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** GolMe was amazing about getting the defective goal replaced. Best customer service I've experienced in some time. I'm updating my review from 2 stars to 5. ORIGINAL POST Bought these in April and one of the goals broke in July. They were only lightly used. For the money they should last more than 3 months. Everything about the product is great except for the durability/quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sluciak

customer_reviews.title: The best for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd set of "less expensive" goals I have purchased for my team in the past 5 years. These are by far the best. Yes they fold up like many others, but these goals have two velcro closures built in, not just a cheap snap. They also have sturdy ground pegs that are permenately connected to the goal with bungie straps meaning you won't ever lose them. They have not blown around in the wind, and stay put after hours of goals kicked. I am very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and right size for my 3yr old to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and right size for my 3yr old to practice her kicking skills. Sturdy and durable. Takes a couple minutes to figure out how to put back in original shape, but once you get the hang of it, it is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Rick

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Pops open easily. VERY EASY to fold and put back in the black bag. My kids are loving these. Probably the best thing I bought for them ! Also comes with plastic anchors to push into the grass. I haven’t needed them yet but they are attached to the net so you can’t loose them. The orange is a nice color too.
customer_reviews.author: Tay Bender

customer_reviews.title: These nets are great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my 6 year old son was starting to get interested in soccer. I thought this would help to teach some skills. Not only has he loved having them, but the whole neighborhood comes out now to play. I love the ground pegs that allow you to keep them situated in place, and I love how light and easy they are to carry. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I paid under $50 for these and for the price they were serviceable. I coach my daughter's 3 yo team and my son's 4-5 yo team. Worked for both of them. it would also have been the perfect set of goals for a pickup game with my friends -- back when I was single. Its not good for having a goalie. Even a small child takes up most of the goal. But it is very effective for giving direction and doing offense v. defense drills some direction. I wish they were a little bigger. Also two of the stakes broke but after the season.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Fold up storage.
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about these goals is that you can fold them up. That makes storing them easy, plus you can take them with you on the go should you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a great company!
customer_reviews.text: The goals came on time and are of high quality. They fold up really easily once you get the knack of them. My 7 year old can open them by himself, drag them out to the yard and bring them back to our porch all on his own. He just needs an adult to fold them up. He (and we) are thrilled with them! On top of that, the company has fabulous customer service checking in twice in the last 30 days to be sure I'm satisfied with my purchase. Assuming they hold up (which I have no doubt they will), I would highly recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 uses.
customer_reviews.text: We picked these up for my son's practice's. They're young players, so there were *maybe* 10-20 shots taken on goal in the first two practices. When I took them out for the third, I realized that the bar which flexes to form the goal had snapped in half. I contacted Amazon customer service, since GOLME does not seem to be involved in the sale of these items. They think it was a manufacturing defect, and Amazon took them back. (I had to complain in order to avoid the restocking fee.) I'm a little gunshy on ordering another set.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Simon

customer_reviews.title: Soccor on the Go or At Home
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to carry on a walk to the park, super durable, and provide so much fun. Takes a little bit to get the hang of disassembly but there is a video on how to do it. I just always feel like I am breaking them when I take them apart, but they have held up great. Comes with a nice carrying case. We don't have room to store regular full size goals and have a smaller yard so these are perfect to taking on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed by these goals. Love the carrying case, how light they are, how well they work when secured to the ground, and how quick and easy it is to set up and take down. Quick warning - when you start to unfold them for the first time, pay attention to how they twist and pop out. Without knowing how they twist into the folded position, everyone is baffled at first how to fold them up. I too thought I was going to break it when twisting it, but if done the right way it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Nice nets!
customer_reviews.text: I coach a 3/4 Soccer team and these are perfect! Since these kids are just being introduced to the sport, these are just the right size to teach them precision. They are very easy to set up and take down. We have practiced on very windy days and the stakes held the goals up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: EruFam1

customer_reviews.title: 4' Perfect Size - U14
customer_reviews.text: Using the 4' goals for U14 and they are perfect. We really enjoy the three point ground staking capability. Great quality and easy to unpack and pack-up.
customer_reviews.author: Syilus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I received exactly what I expected. I coach youth soccer and use these goals in practice to help with accuracy in scrimmages. I used to use a different type of portable goal which took up more space in my garage and took several minutes to set up. These fold down into a simple carrying case (roughly 40x30x2 inches) and are very light. Setup is as quick and easy as pulling them apart and stomping three stakes into the ground. Through several weeks of kids falling into these and stomping on them they are not yet showing any wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick, and durable.
customer_reviews.text: These goals are very easy and quick to setup. I coach 7U soccer and used these every practice. I also use them at home anytime my son wants to kick the ball in the yard. It literally just pops open and is ready to use in under 10 seconds. I have used them for one season and they seem durable. Players sometimes fell into them during practice and the goals withheld the pounding. Could not be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason griffith

customer_reviews.title: Soccer anyone?!
customer_reviews.text: Love these goals. I've tried others but these are more durable, I like the orange color contrast for the nets and best of all, the ground stakes are attached. The carrying case makes for easy transport and my kids can set-up on their own when they want for backyard play. I also use these for my youth soccer practices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Dad

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE BUYING!!
customer_reviews.text: Avoid these at all costs. I purchased these about a month ago. Used them at a kids practice and after the second practice, one of them snapped. The boys are all under 8 years old, none of them would shoot the ball hard enough for the cheaply made goal to snap. Two weeks after that, the second goal snapped as I was folding to put away. I knew from the start I should have sprung the extra 20$ for PUGG brand but I went cheap and got exactly what I paid for. Save yourself a hassle, a headache, and some money... DON'T BUY THESE.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Both broken after three practices.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Bought two sets. Two came out of the bag broken. One more broke after three practices. Don’t even bother with the fourth one because it will probably break shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a coach these come in so handy!! No matter how many times my kids have kicked the netting to retrieve their balls the netting doesn't have a tear in it. My kids are u5 and like to hang all over the net and even when they fall through, the nets pop right back up. Easy set up and storage. I recommended these to a few other coaches this season because i am so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These goals are much larger (when collapsed) than I had anticipated. I'm not even sure one could call them portable!
customer_reviews.author: dannyt

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these because they had pretty good reviews
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because they had pretty good reviews. They were great for the first two months of use, then the soccer season was over (November 2014). I wrapped them up in their little case, and put them away in the garage to use the next season (August 2015). Took them out last week to the first practice of the new season only to find out that as I was taking them out of the bag one of the compression sticks completely split in half. Now Amazon won't take them back. UPDATE- Manufacturer sent two new replacements for free because the originals were still under warranty. Used the replacements about 3 times. They are now broken again.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Coach 99

customer_reviews.title: Both goals broke after two months.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these two goals for our two-year-old daughters. They were used for a month (put away in their bags each night) when both dome peaks snapped after being unfolded. I emailed the company directly requesting replacement rods. I got an email the same day requesting pictures if the broken products, but haven't heard if the product will be replaced or not. Other reviewers had the same problem. I should have read them before buying
customer_reviews.author: **A

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer goals
customer_reviews.text: These are light weight, easy to fold and put back into carrying case. Another plus is that the stakes to hold them in place are attached with a strap so you don't lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great compact goal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and store away. Very nice and compact. It was a little tricky closing it the first time, but once you figure it out it's a breeze. U just have to make sure you twist the goal as you pull the line in EDIT: this company has amazing customer service. We cracked one of the plastic pegs. Didn't know there were metal ones in the bag. They sent us replacements and made sure we received them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Tilley III

customer_reviews.title: So close
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these are great goals. I bought 2 sets, one for my daughter and one for my boys and girls soccer teams. My daughters set is going strong for well over a month now, but I have had horrible luck with mine. Both times I opened my goals to use them for practice they were broken. I am buying a third set however because I love how they look, store, and function as a training tool. Plus my daughter loves them as well
customer_reviews.author: William Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Use goals weekly for soccer practices. Goals setup and fold down quickly and easily. Plastic spikes are durable. I use a hammer to drive them into the ground when it has not rained recently. Metal spikes would be nice, but the plastic ones work fine.
customer_reviews.author: J Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great product/price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought these for my son's birthday. I chose them because of the great price and reviews. They work well. Then, we showed up to his soccer and they are what his coach is using for practices. I would recommend and buy again for a gift if needed.
customer_reviews.author: jessh

customer_reviews.title: Great goals
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought the smallest size and they are really small, but they’re great quality and easily put up/taken down. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I have children in our program from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a children's church event and we have used them over and over again. I love them. I have children in our program from pre-school to 6th grade at the events. I plan on purchasing a larger size for the older children. I have taken them to the park, pulled them out to use on a whim. They are light, easy to set up, and fold away and are easy to put up. They are portable and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy Soccer Goals
customer_reviews.text: These arrived last week and we have already used them 4 times. They are so easy to pop back into the sleeve or to open up for use. We needed some thing small and portable. After inspecting, I believe these are made well and will last. Will update my review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Great, great
customer_reviews.text: Great, great, great product so far. I use the pair of goals for two teams (U12 and College) and they are super easy to use on the fly! They have been durable so far and absolutely the best value for quality....buy these over pugg to save a few bucks! I absolutely love these goals! includes: two goals and traveling bag nothing to assemble or take apart!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The spikes don't stay in the ground well enough. Would probably be okay for toddlers, but for older kids that kick hard the spikes constantly come out. And the netting ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold up
customer_reviews.text: These nets are everything that was promised and more. Easy to fold up, and made of terrific material. The only reason I did not give it five stars is I wish the ground stakes were metal (I would of paid another 10 dollars for that) - they are not cheap plastic, but still can be sensitive to a tough turf. However, the way the goals are designed you can easily upgrade the stakes if you need to overtime if they break or wear out. Terrific product, my assistant coach liked them so much he is getting himself a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pop-Up Goals
customer_reviews.text: So far, 5 weeks into practice and these goals are standing up well. They are great for setting up a quick small sided game. They pop open and fold shut easily and are held with velcro straps to keep them from popping open. They both fit into the bag nicely and make toting them to the field with the rest of the equipment easy. They also store nicely behind the seat of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Willy_HSV

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4, 2 Broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these, 2 broke already. One the plastic inside came out and is unusable. Another the netting is ripped off. Puggs are stronger products, but costlier.
customer_reviews.author: NBG

customer_reviews.title: Great goals
customer_reviews.text: These are great so far. My 9yr old can easily set them up. Folding them up is another story. He cannot find them on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Angie P

customer_reviews.title: These work great for the yard
customer_reviews.text: These work great for the yard. My 5 and 7 year olds practice with them regularly and so far they are very sturdy! Great price. My only complaint is that I wish I would have bought the set that was slightly larger. No big deal they just have to work harder which helps with accuracy. I would recommend to other buyers!
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Good goals for home or coaching
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 6 foot goals. They are ideal for taking to my U8 soccer practices. Also great for a quick pop up goal for my kids to play in the yard. One of my goals has a quality defect though. It’s missing the rear stake so the balls go through the back occasionally. The other one has it so they need to check their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: G. Keier

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the step son. He loves them. They've stood up to everything he's managed to do to them, and he's brutal. We've only had them about 6 months (approximately), so longevity has yet to be shown. We'll see how they hold up through at least one more season.
customer_reviews.author: your mother

customer_reviews.title: Order larger size
customer_reviews.text: I was in between about what size to order. I went with the 4 feet and it much smaller then expected. It’s to difficult to return but I would definitely recommend if you are on the fence size up. As of now the kids keep kicking the ball over the goal but we will make the product work. Overall quality looks good and like it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Darleen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. I have two boys who love to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I have two boys who love to play soccer. They play every evening. Unfortunately, these goals have not lasted. They are completely torn within just a few months. I don't recommend this product for anyone. Very flimsy material.
customer_reviews.author: Sapna Hira

customer_reviews.title: super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These were a great addition to the back yard for my grandson's visit. They were also good for creative play, he put them together and made a hideaway. So easy to store for the next visit.
customer_reviews.author: The Dawnilator

customer_reviews.title: Easy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Really convenient to set up in the backyard. After 2 months of heavy use by 10 year old boy, they show no wear
customer_reviews.author: @Pitman_knives

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun with grandson!
customer_reviews.text: Great soccer goals and easy to store. We have had many hours of practice and games with our grandson. There are pegs to secure into ground but had very strong winds that picked it up and carried it away! We found it in our neighbors backyard but no damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and repack in case. Seems sturdy and works well. Very pleased using them for drills with my U15 rec team.
customer_reviews.author: tom746

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Nail Down Into Turf Field
customer_reviews.text: After the fact, one might think ... well duh, it doesn't nail down into a turf field, but it isn't something that originally crossed my mind. I purchased this for my soccer team and realized once I was on the turf field, with the black pellets on it, that it wasn't going to nail down with the stakes provided. Now I'm wondering if another stake might do the job. Suggestions welcomed.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Silva

customer_reviews.title: Pop Up Soccer Goal
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to help with our kids soccer practices. Easy set up, good quality and good price - we almost purchased 1 goal from a different store for the same price that we got these 2!
customer_reviews.author: trichards5

customer_reviews.title: Pop up nets
customer_reviews.text: These were an awesome but. Bigger than expected. Fold easily into a nice flat shape. They are a gift but now I want them for our family. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Gina

product_meta.title: GOLME PRO Pop Up Soccer Goal - Two Portable Soccer Nets with Carry Bag - Sizes 2.5’, 4’ and 6’
feature_bullets: Set of 2 soccer goals with carry bag for games in the backyard, park or beach
Simply twist open for instant play then twist flat for easy storage and transport
New indestructible frame for years of play - ultra reflective net for hours of fun
Available sizes for every skill - safe for for players and teams of all ages
Try risk free for 30-Days - then enjoy an additional 365-Day Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
